wahama kriyathmaka wana paridi shri lanka krikat therim kamituwa iwath karana lesata krida amathya fayisar musthapa wisin shri lanka krikat aayathanaye pradhana widhayaka niladhari ashli da silwa wetha lipiyak margayen danum di athi bawa antharjala madhya wartha karayi.esema shri lanka hitapu simitha panduwara nayaka anjalo mathiwswa labana masa engalanthaya samaga pawathwena ekdina tharagawaliya sandaha wu shri lanka sanchithayata athulath karannayida amathyawaraya wisin upades laba di athi bawada pawaseyi.asiyanu kusalana tharagawaliyedi shri lanka kandayamata muhuna dimata siduwu parajaya hethuwen therim kamitu upades matha anjalo mathiws siya nayakathwayen illa aswimata katayuthu kaleya.kese wethath kandayam puhunukaru wu chandika hathurusinhatada asiyanu kusalanaye parajaye wagakime kotasak himi wiya yuthu bawata amathyawarayage mathaya wi athi bawada pawaseyi.

mema awasthawe mema pare giya wita mata basa ganimata lehesi bawin mema paththen harawa yanna kiya aya perera mahathagen karana lada illimata anuwa rathaye gaman margaya wenas kirimata sidu wiya.kisima geyak dorak pahan eliyak nathi musala parisarayaka rathaya gaman karana awasthawe othana nawathwanna kiya aya jip rathaya nathara karawagena aththe sohon pitiyak asalayi.aya jip rathaye thibu uuru gathaya sahitha baskat ekada athe ellagena kadinam gamanin gos sohon pitiye wasa thibu gettuwa udin paninawa dutu perera mahatha ohu wismayata path wiya.ema awasthawe thaman samaga pamina aththe awatharayak bawa therum gath perera mahatha thama langa thibu mathpan bothalaya wiwrutha karagena in bagayak pamana ugurata dekata ada dama jip rathaye dora aragena sohon pitiye gettuwa langata gos ado “umbaa rohini newi mohini wunath mama baya na yako” kiyamin gettuwata dun pa paharin ohuge kakulada thuwala wiya.awasanaye kakule wedanawath athiwu biyath samaga wahanayata godawu ohuta wahanaya wadidurak padawimata nohaki wiya.
